Card1.title: SEDANS
Card1.subtitle: Choose a sedan for its affordability and excellent fuel economy. Ideal for cruising in the city or on your next road trip.

Card2.title: SUVS
Card2.subtitle: Take an SUV for its spacious interior, power, and versatility. Perfect for your next family vacation and off-road adventures.

Card3.title: LUXURY
Card3.subtitle: Cruise in the best car brands without the bloated prices. Enjoy the enhanced comfort of a luxury rental and arrive in style.
